resume.title: Upload Your Resume

guidelines.title: ðŸ“Œ Resume Requirements
guidelines.requiredList: Personal details (name, email, phone, location), target role/title, education history, work or internship experience
guidelines.optionalList: Projects, skills, research, achievements/awards, personal website, LinkedIn, GitHub

resume.instructions: Drag your resume below or click to browse. Supported formats: PDF, DOC, DOCX (max 2 MB).

jobs.title: Provide Job Descriptions
jobs.subtitle: Paste up to three job descriptions below. We'll compare them with your resume to find the best match.

dashboard.empty: No improved resume found. Please click "Improve" on the job upload page first.
dashboard.jobAnalysisNotImplemented: Job analysis is not implemented yet.

resumePanel.title: Updated Resume
resumePanel.caption: This improved resume can be refreshed from the resume upload page.

labels.fileArea: File upload area. Drag files here or click to browse.
